CustomField.formula: IF( Contract_Start_Date__c = Contract_End_Date__c, TotalPrice, IF( IF( IF(Close_Date__c < DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 7, 1), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 6, 30), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c) + 1, 6, 30)) > Contract_End_Date__c, Contract_End_Date__c, IF(Close_Date__c < DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 7, 1), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 6, 30), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c) + 1, 6, 30)) ) = IF(Close_Date__c > Contract_Start_Date__c, Close_Date__c, Contract_Start_Date__c), (1 / ( (Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c) + 1)) * TotalPrice, IF( ( IF( IF(Close_Date__c < DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 7, 1), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 6, 30), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c) + 1, 6, 30)) > Contract_End_Date__c, Contract_End_Date__c, IF(Close_Date__c < DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 7, 1), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 6, 30), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c) + 1, 6, 30)) ) - IF(Close_Date__c > Contract_Start_Date__c, Close_Date__c, Contract_Start_Date__c) ) > 0, ( ( IF( IF(Close_Date__c < DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 7, 1), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 6, 30), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c) + 1, 6, 30)) > Contract_End_Date__c, Contract_End_Date__c, IF(Close_Date__c < DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 7, 1), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c), 6, 30), DATE(YEAR(Close_Date__c) + 1, 6, 30)) ) - IF(Close_Date__c > Contract_Start_Date__c, Close_Date__c, Contract_Start_Date__c) ) + 1 ) / (Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c + 1) * TotalPrice, 0 ) ) )
CustomField.label: In Year Revenue
